Basically the ubuntu install does all the work for you, the main thing is setting up the partitions and making sure when you install, ubuntu knows to install only to the empty partition
When you start your pc it will give you a menu and you press up and down keys to select the system
Grub is a bootloader. It runs when the system is started and tells the computer how to load the various installed system
